features: What have we cleverly and carefully placed in our Lavender air freshener Scented Wood Bead Diffuser? The floral, herbal, garden-fresh scent of Lavender
Provides up to 45 days of fragrance of that oh-so-lovely Honeysuckle scent
Perfect air freshener for home: use it for walk-in closets, bathrooms, bedrooms, your home office, the kitchen or any space you want to make special
Scented oil diffuser made from renewable ingredients like repurposed wood
Made with essential oils and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients
body.description: How about a sensible, clever, and easy way to keep your home spaces full of delightful, garden-inspired Lavender scent? Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day Scented Wood Bead Diffuser is precisely that, and it looks lovely at the same time. It’s a charming and decorative wooden diffuser automatic air freshener, and is also adjustable and simple to use. The wooden beads bring the scents of the outdoors in and release the fresh, clean and floral fragrance of Lavender for up to 45 days. Oh, lovely Lavender! Such a pretty and reassuring herb. It’s easy and fun to refresh, by just giving it a shake. This Lavender air freshener has been made with essential oils and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients, and of course there are no artificial colors or phthalates. And – as always – our formulas are cruelty-free and never tested on our animal friends. Yes, the room freshener container looks great, and it also has a recyclable cardboard exterior, while the beads that release the fragrance are made from repurposed wood. Perfect for walk-in closets, bedrooms, your home office, the kitchen or even as a bathroom air freshener – works great as a gift too. And to make what’s already great even better, you can choose from a bunch of other garden-inspired scents, as well as products such as Body Lotions, Laundry Detergents, Soap, Tin Candles, and more. Mrs. Meyer’s – Rooted in Goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Greener Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What’s not to like about Mrs Meyers?
reviews.reviewText: Love Mrs Meyers products great quality and I love the scents. I have these in my bathrooms and closets. The scent is not overpowering ( I use the lavender ones) I love that the packaging is all recyclable- just paper and wooden balls. You could probably infuse the beads with natural oils after they lose their initial scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a strong scent
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews and ignore them as was hoping it was a stronger scent-alas not very strong at all. Smells fabulous but very faint. Doesn’t work well in a bathroom with teenagers :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not long lasting scent
reviews.reviewText: The scent was supposed to last for about 6 months and I have only been using it for 2…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How goods are made
reviews.reviewText: You can't go wrong with Mrs. Meyers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not much smell
reviews.reviewText: Bummed.... I love Mrs. Meyers products. And I love the smell of honeysuckle. However, there wasn't a lot of smell upon opening it and that continued. But day 3-4 I couldn't smell it at all. It's not a cheap item for so little time and effect. Sorry I purchased and I wouldn't do it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Turn it upside down
reviews.reviewText: At the time of my review, I’ve been using the Lemon Verbena-scented version for a month. I expected the scent to last that long, even though product details state “up to 45 days”. I put it in a closet that’s opened briefly about 3 times per week. The fragrance was slightly noticeable for about 2 weeks. As of right now, I no longer smell anything. I really wanted that nice Lemon Verbena breeze when I opened the closet door : ) It does still seem to be doing the job of keeping my closet fresh, so that's something. Here’s a tip, for what it’s worth: turn the container upside down to disperse as much of the scent through the openings as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not smell
reviews.reviewText: I love lavendar Mrs Myers!! My favorite smell. So I was excited to see an air freshner for my powder room. Sorely disappointed. Doesn't smell at all unless you shake it and even then it doesn't last. So sad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this. Smells amazing
reviews.reviewText: Very good to keep a area smelling nice without taking up a lot of space.
